doc:
Andy Berman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andy_Berman 0 Andrew Mark Berman (born February 24, 1968) is an American actor, director, producer, writer, voice artist, and comedian, best known as the voice of Dib Membrane and various other characters in Invader Zim. Andrew_Mark_Berman ( born February_24 , 1968 ) is an_American_actor , director_,_producer_,_writer_,_voice_artist , and comedian , best_known as the_voice of Dib_Membrane and various_other_characters in Invader_Zim .
